message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $120. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $105 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. To continue our negotiation, I am proposing a price of $110 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering the value I place on it and what you're willing to pay.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counterpropose a price of $107 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to move closer to your price. My counteroffer is $108 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement that is satisfactory for both of us.
I appreciate your effort in adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to counterpropose a price of $106 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your valuation of the product. My counteroffer is $107 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value I place on it and your willingness to pay. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. Considering the product's value to me and my financial constraints, I would like to counterpropose a price of $105 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. My final counteroffer is $106 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on it and your willingness to pay. I hope we can finalize this transaction.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. Considering the product's value to me and my budget, I would like to make a final counteroffer of $104 for the product.
